skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: Unleashes a devastating explosion of pure magical energy. Consumes a massive amount of SP.

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Restores a moderate amount of HP to a target. A fundamental healing spell.

skills.name: Steal
skills.description: Attempts to pilfer an item from a target. Success depends on dexterity and luck.

skills.name: Lullaby
skills.description: Sings a soothing melody that can put enemies to sleep. Affects creatures with low magical resistance.

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Hurls a searing ball of fire at a single target.

skills.name: Create Water
skills.description: Conjures a small amount of clean water. Useful for survival or distracting fire elementals.

skills.name: Sacred Break Spell
skills.description: A powerful anti-magic spell that can dispel enemy enchantments and barriers. Requires high spiritual focus.

skills.name: Arrow Rain
skills.description: Fires a volley of arrows into an area, hitting multiple targets.

skills.name: Nature's Embrace
skills.description: Heals minor wounds and grants a temporary boost to agility within a natural environment.

skills.name: Shield Slam
skills.description: Slams a shield into an enemy, dealing blunt damage and potentially stunning them.

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: Provokes enemies, drawing their aggression towards the caster. Essential for tanking.

skills.name: Void Matter Control
skills.description: Manipulates unstable void energy to create small, destructive bursts or protective barriers.

skills.name: The Soul Reaper
skills.description: Summons a spectral blade that can harvest the life force of weakened foes, restoring the caster's HP.
